content: This is the FHIR Developer Days 2016 channel for the Dutch PHR / MedMij track.

Hi. To participants: you may find the preliminary script here https://simplifier.net/ui/ig/MedMij

In the script you will also find the details for the server. Note that the script is a starting point. Since this our very first in its kind we anticipate and welcome your ideas on how to improve.
@Alexander Henket Link is not working for me: "Cannot process the request".

We currently have a problem in offering this page publicly for some reason, but we have a workaround for that. Please let us know your simplifier account name if you are interested in the contents. We hope to eliminate the need for this workaround soon

Update 15:15: page is now presumably completely public as planned. Should you still have issues: let us know
The server has been reloaded with all observations linking to the same example Patient.
This has however, the consequence that this was a full reset. Any resources you created yourself have been removed.
